content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I’m here to help you schedule your plumbing service. To get started, can I please have your name?
I don’t feel like giving out my name. Can you just come and fix the problem?
I understand your concern. To provide the best service, I do need some basic information like your name and address. Could you please provide your address first?
No address either. Just send someone over. I really don’t want to give info.
I want to make sure we send a plumber to the right place and at a time convenient for you. Could you please share your address so we can check if you’re in our service area?
I’m telling you, no address. Just come by whenever you want.
Unfortunately, without an address, I can’t schedule a service. Please provide your address so we can assist you.
This is ridiculous. Forget it. Don’t contact me again.
